lender.name: Thor
lender.loan_because: Part of being in the world is being productive. I want to give people that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I manage benefits for those injured as a result of their work activities.

lender.name: Rob & Lori
lender.loan_because: To help others!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune of being born in the US by helping others who want to help themselves. Kiva is a remarkable way of connecting people who want to share.
lender.occupational_info: After a number of years as a corporate guy, I was self-employed for 17 years in marketing research. I am just beginning my new role as a busy retired old guy!

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: I hope someone would do the same for me
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student

lender.name: danny ryan
lender.loan_because: i owe it because i was lucky to be born where i was
lender.occupational_info: i'm a student in computer engineering

lender.name: Julianna
lender.loan_because: It feels right!
lender.occupational_info: I think I'm doing well and I enjoy school. You can learn a lot.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other mothers around the world support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the helicopter industry helping the military support helicopters that are currently in their fleet.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I care and I have more wealth than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying to become an aeronautical or astronautical engineer at Purdue University.

lender.name: Scott Family
lender.loan_because: we know others may need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Our family has jobs in all different areas: tailoring, to electronic sales, to flight attendant (airlines). We work in different areas, but are always willing to help each other and anyone else that is in need.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: My brother started this as a Christmas gift.
lender.occupational_info: I live on a small island and run a small hotel and restaurant.

lender.name: Jef
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea. People helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a computer to create graphics used for packaging.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: boring

lender.name: Rubino Family
lender.loan_because: we want to do our part.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: It requires such little of us to give something so great to others. Seeing someone prosper because of a small act of kindness is priceless.
lender.occupational_info: I work for tv, film, music, commercials, and live shows where I create and show the dancers/actors/singers how to dance and what to do.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have access to money.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids ages 9-15 that are not able to be educated in the public eduction system due to their disabilities.

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: A duty to help our Brothers and Sisters
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in High School and i am studying hard for the future.

lender.name: Regan
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving someone a hand up, not a handout.

lender.name: Anne's Family
lender.loan_because: In memory of Anne, our mother and grandmother, a world traveler and inspirational woman who made friends wherever she went.

lender.name: Lu and Nancy
lender.loan_because: We were supported when we were starting out and love the idea of supporting others in turn.
lender.occupational_info: We are students and teachers in a lifelong learning program at the University of Arizona and volunteers in a local hospice.

lender.name: Zubin
lender.loan_because: I feel it's the right thing to do, and I want to stop world hunger.
lender.occupational_info: I am an 11 year old boy in Oregon, USA. I like reading fantasy novels, playing video games, and playing soccer. Instead of gifts for my birthday, I asked my friends to donate to Kiva.

lender.name: Matt & Leigh
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales, she is an editor.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but spent my working life with computers

lender.name: Maya
lender.occupation: I\'m a fifth grade student, age 10

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed, and giving back is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit proposals for a variety of projects

lender.name: Niki
lender.loan_because: i share what i have.
lender.occupational_info: i teach kids about wildlife and ecology. I work with animals at a small zoo in California.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: environmental

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: "There is enough in the world for everyone's need; there is not enough for everyone's greed." ~Ghandi

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: i wish to spred happeness :]

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: every person should have access to money to fund their businesses and so that free markets can work their magic.

lender.name: Sarah & Jim
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to support and to connect with our brothers and sisters here on our little corner of the galaxy.

lender.name: Leron
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in eliminating poverty
lender.occupational_info: I'm the Executive Director of a Children's Hospital in Niamey, Niger

lender.name: lorrie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: online retailer of home improvement products

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. Everyone has a dream of becoming independent and becoming successful at something. I was fortunate to have that opportunity, but many many others are not. I want to provide that opportunity to others.
lender.occupational_info: When people need help because they are sick or cannot take care of themselves, I find out who they are, where they live, and why they are sick. Then I work with community members to solve the problem.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: it is a way to connect with others throughout our Global Village.
lender.occupational_info: I support the health and well being of young children through work with their families and schools.

lender.name: chelsea
lender.loan_because: God has given me so many blessings, so I would love to help people out there who are working hard, but may not be as lucky as me to have these resources.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school five days a week. I am in the middle of my second year of high school and am planning on entering a university in the year 2011. I also play soccer as often as I can. It is a great passion of mine.

lender.name: John and Carol
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Graciela
lender.loan_because: I believe in creating community and helping people live their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I write books and magazine articles

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Was thinking about what to do if we won the lottery; Then remembered hearing about Kiva and decided that it wasn't necessary to wait on the lottery.
lender.occupational_info: Have spent most of my life and careers with these ideals in mind: Do what you can to help people when given the opportunity; Do the right thing; Treat people the way you want to be treated; Do what you can to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Kirsty
lender.occupation: career on hold to focus on being a Mum

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to achieve opportunities that they strive for.
lender.occupational_info: I work to maintain a safe source of drinking water for people in the State of Nevada, USA.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I like helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still in high school, so i work at the family store to help my parents pay the tuition.

lender.name: mike and sue wright
lender.loan_because: it's a way to help make a difference on a level i can appreciate

lender.name: Bakima
lender.loan_because: Helping out those who may not have as many opportunities as myself to achieve their goals is thrilling.

lender.name: The BBGB Family
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family with two parents, their three daughters, three sons-in-law, and seven grandchildren (ranging in age from 3 to 16). The Blums, Beckers, Glodowskis and Berryhills.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: not rich, yet fortunate

lender.name: Kurian Tharakan
lender.loan_because:
I want to give people access to opportunity.
KIVA gives us a simple, easy, way to make a difference.
Do you want to help change the social ills that plague this world? Help people get on their feet. Kiva is an incredibly innovative channel to do this!

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: my travels lets me see who really needs my help

lender.name: TheLynx
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people do their jobs.

lender.name: charlie
lender.loan_because: Giving people in less fortunate countries an opportunity to make a living will make the world a better place.

lender.name: najia
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach middle school. My husband is a soldier and we have 4 children.

lender.name: Daniel R.
lender.occupational_info: Building social casual games for live sporting events.

lender.name: Marvin
lender.occupational_info: I retired from the power generation industry

lender.name: BubbSnugg
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: The Messiah lives. Lives in me. and others.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to share my good fortune with others. I am grateful for all that has been bestowed upon me and the gift to share.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: something as little as $25 may seem insignificant, but it can change the life of someone else.

lender.name: Norm
lender.loan_because: I am a self employed person and have been for many years. I can appreciate the need for cash to grow.
lender.occupational_info: I install, repair, service locks, make keys, and recommend other security services.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think we can improve the world intelligently through micro finance organizations like Kiva !

lender.name: Tigger
lender.loan_because: I like Kiva and Kiva loves people.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to have a positive effect on people that far exceeds the expense involved in doing so.
lender.occupational_info: I assess insurance risk, and put a price on that risk.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help and share.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I believe that we have an obligation to use our good fortune to support those throughout the world.
What may seem small to us can make a lifetime of difference in other countries

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It takes so little money, so little time, so little effort to make such a big impact in another person's life. Who wouldn't want to be part of it?
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a large urban public school. I work with students in grades 6 to 8. I teach literacy--reading and writing. I have been a teacher for 20 years.

lender.name: Wm H
lender.loan_because: The Kiva program allows me to partner with other lenders in assist ing those wanting to help themselves. In this manner everyone gets to share in the warm fuzzy feeling of building a better world.

lender.name: Cecelia and Bruce
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Robert Menasian
lender.loan_because: This is the kind of world I want to live in where a need is met through a caring community. Thank you Kiva for giving me an opportunity to make a difference.

lender.name: PineRidgeProducts
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance, someone gave me one and it is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: We build small wind powered generators.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to offer help.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy working on computers, but I love to play music from other countries.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to offer a hand up, not a hand out. I've been able to reloan money several times now and it's great!

lender.name: Doyle
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone to carry their own weight in the world.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I Repair and build The Plumbing and electrical parts of houses

lender.name: Margen
lender.loan_because: I was born into tremendous opportunity compared with some other people in the world, and I want to share that with those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a veterinary specialist's office doing IT and marketing work.

lender.name: John Cammick
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people start there own business which will provide a better life for there families.
lender.occupational_info: Grow many different types of Palm Trees from seedlings and sell as full grown trees to wholesale vendors.

lender.name: laurie
lender.loan_because: it empowers others and supports assistance with dignity
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large residential substance abuse treatment program, and assist human service professionals in supporting recovery from addiction.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Initially because I received a gift certificate, but now simply because I like enabling people to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student currently majoring in human services, and I hope to work with kids or people with disabilities.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can; and if I can, how can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I pay my bills in the computer industry, and feed my soul as a musician.

lender.name: dave richardson
lender.loan_because: i believe in this cause. i believe in the potential of humanity, and would like to do my small part in creating the opportunities to move forward.
lender.occupational_info: i teach graphic design at a university in the Western United States.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: Like to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Gold miner

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can personally help a small business in a developing country grow & flourish, thus helping the surrounding community. It's my way of helping someone else help themself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a commercial electrician. I install electrical equipment, conduit, wiring, lighting, etc. in commercial buildings. All of the necessary parts of a building to make it function electrically.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: So many have helped me along the way of life - I cannot pay them back - but I can pass the gift along to others.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I care about people
lender.occupational_info: I help people resolve their personal problems

lender.name: C Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we love our neighbors and wish them well.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: it gives an individual and their community an opportunity to grow and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help companies make better and safer products in efficient ways. Also to identify suppliers that can supply my companies with product that meets our needs. Also, I own my own business of remodeling homes.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: money should not be a barrier to success. With a good plan, a lot of hard work, and a little luck, a better life is achievable for anyone.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: We all get through this life with help from others.
lender.occupational_info: When people are not feeling well they come to me & I use various methods of healing to help make them better.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: It allows me to use my resources to help others help themselves and their families. I feel that this is helping the world be a better place to live at the very grass roots level.
lender.occupational_info: I renew and remodel houses that are old or in need of repair and then resale for a profit.

lender.name: Dane & Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for an electrical distribution company and my wife is a dance instructor

lender.name: Bill & Connie
lender.loan_because: we have the ability to do so, and also we believe in the determination behind these endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: Correctional Officer/Sales, We also raise gamebirds,honeybees, pork and poultry and both have agricultural backgrounds.

lender.name: Adolf
lender.loan_because: No man is an island . We each need or receive a helping hand at some time.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It is a joy to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I believe that by lending a helping hand, I can make a significant impact on another person's quality of life. Random acts of kindness can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am the editor of an international consulting firm's web site. I help fill up the internet with words.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: KIVA identifies entrepreneurs who desire to achieve and have demonstrated through their actions responsibility in repaying their loans. I am always willing to support such individuals and KIVA provides the perfect opportunity to complement my financial contribution with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for developing policies and procedures to minimize transmission of diseases such as TB and perinatal exposure to hepatitis B and create a framework for public health programs to manage communicable diseases in their jurisdiction.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have the deepest respect for anyone who is trying to improve their lives by working hard. I have had a few breaks in my lifetime and I feel this my way of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I sell Screen Printed and Embroidered Clothing to businesses - example - uniforms to fast food restaurants or large companies who want their employees to have the company logo on their clothing. I am also a musician. I play guitar in a band - I use the extra money I make from playing music to pay for my kids schooling.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have ample enough to share...I believe in the Kiva project and in those requesting assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I taught Health, Physical Education, and Catholic Religion to adolescent girls in Akron, Ohio and in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. Now, at age 60, I am a homemaker.

lender.name: Emiel
lender.loan_because: in my life, I have the opportunity to visit other countries and am able to witness the needs of the people, and the hope and successes that come from being able to realize a real future. Kiva is a great way to give hope to others so that they can realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of a religious community called the Carmelites, and a priest of the Roman Catholic Church. Apart from my duties as a priest, I help others to come to a deeper relationship with God and help them to recognize the action of God in their lives. I also do missionary work, bringing the Good News of Jesus Christ to others.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Why not? It makes good sense really. If you even think about this for a quick minute, that is all it takes. Here you can just put in a couple bucks to help people earn a better living. What seperates developing countries from the USA is opportunity. At KIVA we can help people who want to work find better opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for a newspaper now for sixteen years in a position selling advertising. Most of the accounts I manage are national.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me Kiva credit as a Christmas present a few years ago. I enjoy lending because I know the people who use the money get more out of it that I do.
lender.occupational_info: I study International Environmental Policy, focusing on market-based solutions to environmental conflict.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: this is a tangible way to love others. And through loving others, I love God.
lender.occupational_info: I help build trucks for Toyota.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I love knowing that, even with as little as I have, I can help others improve their lives - and instead of giving money to a faceless "group" I have the satisfaction of knowing who I am helping. A great joy!
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am probably close to being the world's oldest physics student. I decided to go back to school to try and achieve a life long dream after living with chronic, incurable cancer for several years (my last chance!). I don't write much now because I don't have enough energy for school and work both - but my work basically involved writing materials to tell other people about a computer company's products or services.

lender.name: Doug
lender.occupational_info: I repair locomotives (trains)

lender.name: Oscar L
lender.loan_because: I believe Uganda and it's people have a lot of potential! The people very pleasent and hard working! ( I have spent two weeks in Uganda with my church.) We were the guests of United Methodist Bishop Daniel Wandabula who is the Bishop of all of East Africa!
lender.occupational_info: Retired!

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: First; As a 1st generation Mexican-American, I've lived amoungst those who are less fortunate than myself. Second; I taught myself the meaning of the word "empathy".
lender.occupational_info: Simply put; Use math to ensure that a set of computer systems are able to effectively communicate effectively amoungst each other.

lender.name: Chris K
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Dru
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently in school to get my BA degree.

lender.name: John and Pamela
lender.loan_because: Some people just need a little help and if one is in a position to lend a hand, he/she should.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate throughout my life, and I want to help someone else work to achieve their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working at NASA on the communications systems for space missions.

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the process of going to school.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I feel good after I've done it.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to put my money to work to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people get off welfare and find suitable, sustainable employment.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given - much is expected" I am required by the laws of love to pass on my own blessings to others in my world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teens who have difficult lives. I try to help them get an education to open doors in their lives and to make good decisions for their present and future.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving. I think this a great idea, to help someone grow, build, and change their life. I can't think of a more rewarding way to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my day trying to help customers feel welcome and find what they need in our store.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in a way that makes them able to help their families, their communities, and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature to students in grades 9-12 in a suburb of Chicago. The students from my school come from all over the world. More than 73% of them speak another language other than English in their homes. I learn about cultures from all over the world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Microloans make a lot of sense in the developing world and as a more fortunate global inhabitant I consider it a duty.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the scripting group at Red Storm Entertainment working on the next generation of video games.

lender.name: Bernard
lender.loan_because: I was born in Haiti ,so i know first handed how good it will do to people lives.

lender.name: Peter & Rosanne
lender.loan_because: "Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.” Albert Camus
lender.occupational_info: Peter is a sales manager & I work with young people in a residential unit.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I believe in the merits of the work started by Mohammed Yunus.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant to physicians to guide them thru business development opportunities.

lender.name: FAON
lender.loan_because: To put the needs of others before my own. The returns will multiply to keep the help going. Give your life away. We came with NO THING AND WILL LEAVE WITH NO THING.
lender.occupational_info: CLINICAL LABORATORY

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so many ways in my life. Making loans through KIVA is my way of thanking God for all he has given to me.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference where I can't physically be. Also, I want people to get the best out of life that they can. I think this website makes this possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a local organic co-op. I bag groceries and help people find what they need.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: In an environment of cynicism and chicanery I am glad to find a personal way to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a home builder, remodeler and carpenter in Northern California. I also design much of what I build.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I want to help out in any way I can.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I am on Disability, this is a way for me to contribute and not have to have alot of money. We have so much compared to so many others.
lender.occupational_info: I love to work with flowers, arranging them for dinners, and gatherings.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: We want to help decent people in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I do fundamental research in mathematical physics (string theory). My wife is doing cancer research.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: This is a cool way to assist others so they may help themselves and is not promoting expansion of a welfare mindset.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the design and implementation of automation systems for various manufacturing companies

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I care about helping others to be good stewards with their businesses. We all need the help at some time, Jesus tells us to help and Love one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Designer of Church communications, helping to spread the Gospel to the World.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I believe that the micro-loan business model truly works!

lender.name: kathryn
lender.loan_because: Kiva borrowers sincerely work to improve their situation and therefore desire our help

lender.name: Harry and Jackie
lender.loan_because: We want to help people "learn how to fish" for a better life
lender.occupational_info: volunteer work - unpaid, but very satisfying

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: It is a marvelous way to assist another to help themselves to make a better living and provide for their family while improving their living conditions and life style.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired business woman. I worked for 35 years as a professional. My working career included medical technology, communications industry and the travel industry.

lender.name: The Lavista Gang
lender.loan_because: through Kiva our family is learning two important life skills: financial literacy and real generosity - besides global connectivity, entrepeneurial spirit, and many other things....
lender.occupational_info: We are four folks. Two go to school; one teaches design at a local university, the other designs buildings around the world.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Because fortune does not smile equally on all people. I like to think I am helping the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from local Government.

lender.name: Joey & Katie
lender.loan_because: Anything to help a fellow rancher

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: "Do justice, love mercy, walk humbly with God."
lender.occupational_info: I minister to a congregation of urban folks who are committed to social justice, and who care about all God's people all over the world.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I want to help so they can have a better opportunity in their life.

lender.name: Nidhi
lender.loan_because: I've seen firsthand, working in India and Namibia, how far a small loan can take someone. I think everyone deserves a chance and I believe in helping to give people choices and opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a think tank based in Baltimore, MD. I work in public health, mainly in biodefense and biosecurity.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I believe that investing in people brings great returns.
lender.occupational_info: Manage wealth for 300 families.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: It may help others who have little to do better.
lender.occupational_info: retired teacher of children

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: giving is better than receiving. Shout out to all who joined on Christmas Day '07 !!
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired (no longer work), but used to be a chemist and made new drugs for a large pharmaceutical company in the USA

lender.name: Golden Egg
lender.loan_because: Due to others helping me, I am now able to help others.

lender.name: Will Minnig
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to make small contributions so I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Graphic Artist and I would like to paint surrealist and cubist work again.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: "You make a living by what you get. You make a life by what you give." - Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and nonprofits build relationships with key stakeholders and improve their communications.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I develop drawings for the construction of transportation systems.

lender.name: Teresa & Raphael
lender.loan_because: it's money that empowers the recipient to generate his or her own success, and can be paid forward for the indefinite future.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact in the world

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired child psychotherapist.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Freelance writer and editor. Many of my articles and essays deal with my experiences in Africa and living in Mexico; basic human rights issues, as well as wildlife conservation.

lender.name: Scott and Alexis
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others help themselves!

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I care for those living in poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I operated Railroad trains and engines.

lender.name: Roseanna
lender.loan_because: It is important and helps me be connected to others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults how to read and write better so they can get into college.

lender.name: Lianne
lender.loan_because:
People help people. That's life.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world. ~Anne Frank
Live simply that others might simply live. ~Elizabeth Ann Seton
If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one. ~Mother Teresa
A bone to the dog is not charity. Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog. ~Jack London

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and it makes me feel good. What else is there to say.

lender.name: James_Grandma
lender.loan_because: I believe every little bit given can make the world a better place for all the children!
lender.occupational_info: I am a director/professor at a college in Arkansas, USA.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We as Americans have a good life here, all things considered. It is not hard to part with 50 or 100 dollars knowing it is truly needed and has a purpose. Some of us pay more than that for our own cable television, a luxury.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician (drums) who also works at a large music retailer as a sales manager.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: because I can, because I should...do more.
lender.occupational_info: entrepreneur in the business of changing lives

lender.name: BonnieBeth
lender.occupation: i work at the library & play at the beach
lender.loan_because: isn't life grand! how can i NOT loan $25?

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to help create the world that I want to live in.
lender.occupational_info: I make music!

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: I'm thrilled to have received this Christmas gift from my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I own a children's retail store .

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Because loans helped me with entrepeneurial pursuits and I like being able to return the favor in a direct way.
lender.occupational_info: The universal language of music.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: People help people. Corporations help themselves.

lender.name: Carolyn & Bill
lender.loan_because: We're able, we want to help, and we enjoy following the hard work of people working to improve their and their family's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I do surgery of the mouth and face.

lender.name: Lisa Guillory
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great way to help others reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I test the hearing of children and newborn babies at one hospital. At another hospital I test military veterans.

lender.name: SharonM
lender.loan_because: It is always a blessing to give...I believe in the seven principles of Nguzo Saba (Kwanzaa) that reminds us the value of collective work and responsibility...it is our only real purpose...to love and care for one another.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others how to teach others.

lender.name: Demetria and Sylvie
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe it is God's Divine Will for every woman and every girl to have adequate nutrition, bodily integrity, a sound education, and good healthcare. Loaning creates an opportunity to assist with financial independence - the soil in which these divine gifts grow.

lender.name: Al
lender.loan_because: It's the Christian thing to do - to help out my fellow mankind that's in need. God has blessed me. I follow Jesus' example and bless those around me.
lender.occupational_info: I increase productivity & efficiency at a manufacturing plant. I graduated from the University of South Carolina and graduate school at Auburn University.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: very boring

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.occupational_info: I conduct outreach and education in the African immigrant community in the Washington DC metro area. I represent African women and girls facing gender-based violence in immigration proceedings.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to try to help directly if I can. Good Luck!!
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones, handle lost and Found items for belongings of patients in the hospital in our town.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Jinit
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a right to prosper and lead a happy life!

lender.name: Gary M.
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves. The people here asking for help are highly motivated to better themselves and to in turn bless those around them.
lender.occupational_info: As an Occupational Therapist I assist people with how to overcome the challenges they face from physical and/or psychosocial disabilities, so that they can experience optimal function and independence in their daily lives.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to pay it forward.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Overland Park, KS

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still trying to figure that out.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: someone should!

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: After watching Frontline World and seeing the good work Kiva is doing, I realized just how easy it is to make a difference in the world. If all of us gives a little, it adds up to so much.
lender.occupational_info: I retired after working at various jobs for 37 years. However, as a volunteer and a writer, I am busier than when I was working at a full-time paid job. I enjoy giving back to my community.

lender.name: Joel
lender.occupational_info: I paint realistic watercolours and take photographs of themes found in nature which I like to reflect the Master Artist's creation.

lender.name: izet
lender.loan_because: love to help other people

lender.name: The Lorax
lender.loan_because: I want to help people helping themselves. I also want to see the impact of my loan. Where's the satisfaction in sending a hundred bucks to a multi-million dollar charity?
lender.occupational_info: I fly planes. Really small, fast planes.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: A/M Family Fund
lender.loan_because: Aiding sustainable economic development is critical to reducing poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family primarily from Vancouver Canada who choose to provide funds to Kiva as opposed to purchasing gifts for one another at Christmas and other holidays. We will grow this fund over time with the goal of making a continued and increasingly larger impact on poverty in Africa.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Giving to others is giving to myself
lender.occupational_info: Veterinary public health reseach, teaching, and outreach.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I think the Kiva approach is a great way to help people improve their lives at small cost to lenders. Hopefully, some day, the entrepreneurs will be able to become lenders to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a career in Aerospace engineering and now volunteer with Habitat for Humanity and other community organizations.

lender.name: Casey
lender.occupational_info: I build computer software that is used by the government.

lender.name: Cory Thorson
lender.loan_because: I think people are generally good. I also think hard work is valuable, and honest work makes people virtuous. If my $25 can help someone grow a business, work hard, and serve their community, then I feel pretty good about my contribution. Also, it is almost no risk, they pay me back later. This is better than a handout. Once they pay the loan back, I can loan the same $25 again.
lender.occupational_info: I sell school uniforms.

lender.name: J.T.
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help others. It's just that simple

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I know it sounds cliche, But Jesus askes us to take care of the poor. I studied developmental economics at school and this really is one way to make a difference.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have more gifts than I need. The money I loan will make a much greater difference in the lives of others than in mine. We are all diminished in some way when others don't have the chance to have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Danny Daemonic
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: I want to give of myself to help others.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping the small business person is part of the answer.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired, so work is a distant memory. Worked for 45 years in private and public security.

lender.name: Vikas
lender.loan_because: it's fun! ("Now is that a good reason for doing something so earnest, so purposeful, so noble as this?" You're right I'm afraid - it isn't. Sorry!)
lender.occupational_info: I practice symbol juggling. It is not as glamorous as juggling balls, hoops or clubs I admit, but it pays better (and leaves something to spare for Kiva.) Try it!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's the least thing I can do given how much financially better off I am than the vast majority of my fellow humans (because of many advantages I've had, not because I am more capable!)
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor and take care of college students at a large university.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do
lender.occupational_info: designing and maintaining websites

lender.name: Darin and Kim
lender.occupational_info: Computer security software sales / engineering (Darin). Student of Occupational Therapy (Kim)

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I love new business opportunities and it is a way for people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Adjunct Professor, Real Estate Broker, Homebuilder

lender.name: Gunther
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God and would like to empower other farmers in the developing world to increase the economic viability of there agricultural endeavors.

lender.name: maggie
lender.loan_because: I can. Gandhi said we must "be the change we wish to see."

lender.name: Chris Vaughn
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: One Love
lender.loan_because: I want to spread the LOVE.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to extend a hand-up to those who need help to become successful and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: Now retired... creating art work and volunteering with the Salvation Army.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I love to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run machines in a Paper Mill Plant.

lender.name: Mary & Bob
lender.loan_because: We loan to hopefully make a difference in the lives of people, and to foster a sense of well being in the recipients.
lender.occupational_info: Mary taught public elementary school. She taught children ages 6 and 7 years old to read, write, and learn about people and all kinds of things. Bob helped children and families, with all kinds of behavioral and emotional problems, to improve, and to get along together.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I'm a huge believer in the power of microloans, as they give so many people around the world opportunities they would not otherwise have.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping entrepreneurs succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses be more profitable.

lender.name: Jeannine & Jon
lender.loan_because: We loan because we love to help people in need who work hard and deserve a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Jeannine helps create technical solutions (computer applications) to support a pharmaceutical company's sales force. In her spare time she is a potter and also trains for triathlons. Jon works on television/video/film crews and is also a great singer/songwriter and is involved in the music industry.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day, but give him a fishing rod and he'll never go hungry.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I am an 11 year old student and I want to help women in other countries to support themselves and their families

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and want to provide an opportunity for other business people
lender.occupational_info: Manage my own business

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: My brother joined the Peace Corps and witnessed poverty first hand. Since hearing his tales, my entire family has become more conscious of the importance of money and capitalism in developing countries.

lender.name: Wendy the Water Woman
lender.loan_because: Life is about helping others and spreading the Love.
lender.occupational_info: My work is my passion.

lender.name: Vasuki
lender.loan_because: A little help goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: its a very easy and helpful thing to do - and because we have so much excess in this part of the world.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: This is a fabulous program! It is easy, inspiring & personal! My daughter, Jenny & I had a BLAST with this - Christmas investing was a hoot! The entrepreneur's orders were filled so FAST that before we could finish "shopping," we missed out on partnering with some of our favorites! We had to keep scouring the board to grab someone before they were all gone!!!! My grandkitty, Lucy, even made a selection from Senegal, Africa - FISH venders - Yum-o! She's hoping they pay interest in product!
lender.occupational_info: The picture is our dog Peaceful. It was the day before he went to "meet his Maker." We figure he was "cramming for finals!" He's got his little tongue out like he's "feasting on the Word!"

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: my daughter introduced me to KIVA last year & it has been a wonderful experience to watch these entrepreneurs grow their business.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I know that there are others that need help and I know that I can help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: Cuando tengo un poco, quiero ayudar.
lender.occupational_info: Soy un programador de computadoras.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: my aunt thought it would be a great christmas present, and she was right!
lender.occupational_info: I want to study to become an engineer

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers and their networks.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I like it when people try to help themselves and better their position in life.
lender.occupational_info: Ensure security officers are properly trained and our company complies with the security contract we have signed with other companies.

lender.name: Matter
lender.loan_because: We all need to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Easy but mentally taxing somtimes.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I realize that I live a good life compared to others
lender.occupational_info: I like to create things and see it come to life

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Currently living on an inheritance. Good financial future. Buy and sell (occasionally) on eBay. Handyman. Widowed. Looking for a good woman (again). Member of Mensa.

lender.name: Kairi & Family
lender.loan_because: I know how entrepreneurs in need feels like. I was there. Everyone who is fortunate enough to not every have to be there, should lend a helping hand!
lender.occupational_info: You reap what you sow... Gotta go sow now...

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to help others

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I hopefully can help someone in need. I know there were times in my life that I needed someone there for me, I just hope that my small loans will let me be there for someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Full time student working on my MBA

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I would like others to suceed in life as I have. I'm by far rich but enjoy life like others should.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping the peace protecting the public

lender.name: BethBeth
lender.loan_because: How could I not? When the cost of one dinner and a movie can mean the difference between 'existing' and 'living' for a family? Carry your lunch one day a month and you can help three times as many people! I love it, I absolutely love it! What power KIVA gives to my meager offerings. It also makes the best 'occasion' gift for those who already have all the 'stuff' they need.
lender.occupational_info: Alternative healthcare has been a lifelong passion. I have added colon cleansing to my skills and find great satisfaction in watching as clients regain their health, vitality, and quality of life. Former Director of Operations of GPACT.org, I also enjoy writing, research, and the great outdoors. Time in the woods are like a spiritual renewal for me.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I've started two businesses on my own, and wish to encourage the entrepeneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent consultant in the acoustics engineering field and currently travel to Asia, North and South America, and Europe.

lender.name: Ron & Kevin
lender.loan_because: We recently decided to make a contribution on a regular basis to charitable causes, both locally and internationally.

lender.name: Steelrane
lender.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do. I'm doing this in memory of the love of my life "Lucy" (pictured). I have had many pets, but she was more than that she was my baby girl. I miss her so!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers helping others keep their information safe.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: what's small change to me can make a big difference in the life of someone in a third-world country.

lender.name: Gardner & Valerie
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do! It is also a neat way to help those in need around the world!
lender.occupational_info: Right Brain + Left Brain

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I'm delighted to be able to help other people.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: One loan brings ....hope Another shows you care Another simply means you are willing to support the empowerment of thats persons future.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time in an ER/Trauma unit in Orange County, CA. I also substitute teach elementary school children in the local area.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: I want to share when I can... and maybe one day my children will need help, and just maybe someone like you will be there to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am an author and training consultant.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I wish to see everyone be diligent , hardworking and succesfull
lender.occupational_info: Owner and manager of a manufacturing & retail company.

lender.name: chhay
lender.occupational_info: Professional ballet dancer

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: A life lived to help others is the only one that matters.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: I need to buy Karma because of my not so clean youth.
lender.occupational_info: I own an animation studio the make cartoons for television and movies.
